statements: DELETE FROM CreditCardInfo WHERE card_holder_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM CreditCardInfo WHERE id = 1 AND card_number = '1234567890123456';
DELETE FROM CreditCardInfo WHERE card_holder_name = 'John Doe' OR billing_address = '123 Main Street';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM credit_cards WHERE card_holder_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM FraudulentTransactions WHERE fraudulent_reason='stolen credit card';
DELETE FROM FraudulentTransactions WHERE fraudulent_reason = 'Suspicious activity';
DELETE FROM fraud_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 3 AND fraudster_id = 5;
DELETE FROM stolen_cards WHERE reason = 'Lost card';
